resources.string: To play Omega Quiz - Health, you need to answer a sequence of questions about your health and when you are not following the recommended by the professionals we will give you tips for changing your lifestyle.
Guilherme Denck, Luiz Souza, Bruno Fleck, Rafael Santini
is an application with questions and tips about Health. Having as objective it helps the population to have good habits.
How many hours do you usually sleep per day?
Experts recommend sleeping 7 to 8 hours daily
Do you weigh your portions of food with the scale?
Not at the beginning of the diet, but now I started to weigh
No, I use reference quantities.Spoon, cup, flat plate
Yes, since the beginning of the diet
I throw everything on the plate
Experts recommend that for you to lose weight you must weigh food from the beginning of the diet
Do you spend many hours without eating?
No, sometimes at breakfast, but I\'m not without food
No, I keep the same schedules for meals
Experts recommend that you should stick to the same meal times every day
How many liters of water do you drink per day?
I drink between 1 liter to 3 liters per day
Experts recommend that you should drink between 1 liter to 3 liters of water a day to keep your body hydrated
Experts recommend that you should eat fruit every day as they have all the nutrients to maintain your good health
Experts recommend that you do not smoke as it causes several serious health problems
I drink Sugarcane liquor and drips
I drink everything that is alcohol
Experts recommend that you do not drink alcohol because it is very bad for your health
When I wake up, in the afternoon and before bed
Experts recommend that you practice stretching several times a day to not cause injury to your body
Yes, I play a lot on the computer
5 min or more of physical exercises per day
Experts recommend that you exercise daily to maintain your fitness
Experts recommend that you do not eat fast food, but as you like eat only once a week
Congratulations, you are healthy enough\nto finish this quiz!
